description:
go.net/ipv4: delete examples

Existing examples bother godoc or similar applications that
use testing package because the examples don't conform testing
API. They also don't appear on godoc or similars.

On the other hand the package document shows enough examples.
There's no reason to hold bad examples that don't help users.

Update issue 3684

messages.text:
Hello dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.net

On Sat, Jun 15, 2013 at 12:58 PM, <mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com> wrote:

> Description:
> go.net/ipv4: delete exmaples
>
typo here.

>
> Existing examples bother godoc or similar applications that
> use testing package because they don't conform testing API.
>
I don't understand why this is a reason to remove the examples (instead of
making them conforming the Example API)

>
> Also I've realized that people who want to use this package
> don't need examples. So let's drop them.
>
Are you sure about this? Are those people familiar enough with the
API here that they don't need examples?
Even it's the case, I still don't understand why having example is a
bad thing.

On Sat, Jun 15, 2013 at 2:30 PM, minux <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:

>> Existing examples bother godoc or similar applications that
>> use testing package because they don't conform testing API.
>
> I don't understand why this is a reason to remove the examples (instead of
> making them conforming the Example API)

I've a bit tried but realized that making good examples is pretty tough.

>> Also I've realized that people who want to use this package
>> don't need examples. So let's drop them.
>
> Are you sure about this? Are those people familiar enough with the
> API here that they don't need examples?

I think the package document shows enough examples. Additionally
existing examples in example_test.go don't appear on godoc or similars.

> Even it's the case, I still don't understand why having example is a
> bad thing.

Having good examples is pretty nice. I mean, I wrote bad examples
that doesn't appear on on-line documents. So let's drop such useless
examples.

subject: code review 10288044: go.net/ipv4: delete exmaples
